words.definition: To absorb a liquid means to take it inside.
words.example: He used a sponge to absorb the water on the floor.

words.definition: A boss is a person in charge of other people at work.
words.example: My boss is a nice person.

words.definition: A committee is a group of people who meet together to make decisions.
words.example: The schoolâ€™s committee agreed on a new dress code for students.

words.definition: A contract is a written agreement between two people.
words.example: The woman signed a contract when she bought the house.

words.definition: A crew is a group of workers.
words.example: My father has a crew that helps him build houses.

words.definition: To devote time to something means to spend a lot of time doing it.
words.example: She devotes two hours a day to playing the piano.

words.definition: To dig is to make a hole in the ground.
words.example: My dog digs in the yard so he can hide his bones.

words.definition: To dine means to eat dinner.
words.example: The young couple dined at their home.

words.definition: To donate means to give something to help others.
words.example: He donated money to the charity.

words.definition: To double something is to make it twice as much.
words.example: He doubled his money in one year.

words.definition: To elevate something is to put it higher.
words.example: He elevated his feet on a chair.

words.definition: A flavor is the taste of something.
words.example: The ice cream has a strawberry flavor.

words.definition: A foundation is a group that helps people.
words.example: The foundation gives money to schools.

words.definition: A generation is a group of people born around the same time.
words.example: My grandfather's generation was very hard-working.

words.definition: A handle is a part of something that you use to carry it.
words.example: The door handle was broken.

words.definition: A layer is a thickness of something.
words.example: There was a layer of dust on the table.

words.definition: Mud is wet dirt.
words.example: His shoes were covered in mud.

words.definition: If something is smooth, it has no bumps.
words.example: The skin on the baby was very smooth.

words.definition: Soil is the top layer of the Earth.
words.example: We planted the flowers in the soil.

words.definition: If something is unique, it is the only one of its kind.
words.example: Her dress was unique and very beautiful.
